CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, July 26, 1958, pg.12 reads: "Metoka Garden Party - One of the highlights of the annual Metoka Club's garden party last Thursday at the Lemington Ave. Home for Aged Women was the presentation of $1,317 in scholarship awards to 15 students. Mrs. Robert L. Vann, standing before the microphone, introduces Mrs. Charles H. Foggie (to her right) who presents the awards, as Mrs. HIlda Woodruff, president, looks on.  The backs of a few of the many guests can be seen in foreground. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Crowd of men and women facing Jessie Vann standing at microphone and Madeline Foggie wearing dark bonnet, gathered in front of Lemington Avenue Home for Aged Women for Metoka Club's garden party
